mapper.select: select g.grade_id as grade_id, g.grade_start_point as grade_start_point, g.grade_end_point as grade_end_point, g.grade_name as grade_name, g.grade_color as grade_color, g.grade_discount as grade_discount, g.grade_accrual_rate as grade_accrual_rate, g.grade_comment as grade_comment, g.grade_img_url as grade_img_url, m.member_id as member_id, m.member_purchase_point as member_purchase_point, m.member_write_point as member_write_point from t_grade g inner join t_member m on g.grade_id = m.grade_id where m.member_id = #{member_id}
select grade_id, grade_start_point, grade_end_point ,grade_name, grade_color, grade_discount, grade_accrual_rate, grade_comment, grade_img_url,grade_font_color from t_grade order by grade_id asc
mapper.insert: insert into t_grade (grade_start_point, grade_end_point ,grade_name, grade_color, grade_discount, grade_accrual_rate, grade_comment, grade_font_color, grade_img_url) values (#{grade_start_point}, #{grade_end_point},#{grade_name},#{grade_color},#{grade_discount}, #{grade_accrual_rate}, #{ grade_comment},#{grade_font_color},'not url')
